casebody.data:
Neighbors, Appellee, v. Ellis, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Neighbors v. Ellis, 120 Ohio St.3d 276, 2008-Ohio-6105.]

(No. 2008-1147 Submitted September 30, 2008 Decided December 2, 2008.)

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is accepted.

{¶ 2} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Environmental Network Corp. v. Goodman Weiss Miller, L.L.P., 119 Ohio St.3d 209, 2008-Ohio-3833, 893 N.E.2d 173.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents. *277Behnke, Martin & Schulte, L.L.C., and Richard W. Schulte, for appellee. Gallagher Sharp, Jay Clinton Rice, John T. Murphy, and Richard C.O. Rezie, for appellant.
